findings.details: Card spacing, headings, and pagination patterns remain consistent on mobile and desktop.

findings.result: No obvious issues in sampled content
findings.details: Scanned current posts/pages for URL patterns; no placeholder domains found.
Blog post cards rendered via _includes/postbox.html lacked datePublished/dateModified microdata.
Key pages include title/description/keywords and consistent language metadata.

recommendations: Add datePublished/dateModified microdata to blog listing cards for richer SERP snippets.
